content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, nice to meet you. I'm glad you like the apartment. As a landlord, I'm looking to get the highest price possible for this unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I believe the location and the newness of the apartment justify a higher price.

I'm open to negotiations, but I want to make it clear that I won't accept anything lower than 1,500 Euro per month. This is a fair price considering the amenities and the location.

What's your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Hello! I'm interested in renting your apartment. I think it's a great location and the size is perfect for me. I'm willing to offer 1,200 Euro per month. I hope that's a good starting point for our negotiation.

I'm a responsible tenant and I'll take good care of the apartment. I'd also like to mention that I'm a student, so I don't have a regular income. However, I'm willing to provide a guarantee from my parents, who are both professionals and have a steady income.

I hope we can come to an agreement. Let me know if there's anything else you need from me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Well, Yi-Nuo Wang, I appreciate your offer, but I have to be honest with you. The price you're offering is quite low for this apartment. I understand that you're a student, but this apartment is in high demand due to its location and condition. I'm willing to give a discount for a long-term lease, but 1,200 Euro is too low. 

I'm willing to negotiate, but I can't go lower than 1,400 Euro per month. I think this is a fair price for this apartment, and it's a good deal for a tenant like you who wants to stay for a long time. What do you think?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
Thank you for your counteroffer, Mister Schmidt. I understand your perspective, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm afraid that 1,400 Euro per month is still beyond my budget.

As a student, I have limited financial means, and I'm looking for an apartment that fits my budget. I understand that your apartment is in high demand, but I'm willing to take a chance and look for other options that are more affordable.

I'm willing to offer 1,300 Euro per month, but that's the highest I can go. I hope this offer is more reasonable for you, and I'm willing to provide a guarantee from my parents, as I mentioned earlier.

I hope we can come to an agreement, but if not, I understand and will continue my search for another apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Well, Yi-Nuo Wang, I appreciate your persistence. However, I have to decline your offer of 1,300 Euro per month. The apartment is in high demand, and I believe the value of this apartment is worth more than what you're offering.

As I mentioned earlier, I can offer a discount for a long-term lease, but I can't go lower than 1,400 Euro per month. I believe this is a fair price for this apartment, and it's a good deal for a tenant like you who wants to stay for a long time. What do you think?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
Thank you for your response, Mister Schmidt. I understand your perspective, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm afraid that 1,400 Euro per month is still beyond my budget.

As a student, I have limited financial means, and I'm looking for an apartment that fits my budget. While I understand that your apartment is in high demand, I'm willing to take a chance and look for other options that are more affordable.

I'm willing to offer 1,350 Euro per month, which is the highest I can go. I hope this offer is more reasonable for you, and I'm willing to provide a guarantee from my parents, as I mentioned earlier.

I hope we can come to an agreement, but if not, I understand and will continue my search for another apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Well, Yi-Nuo Wang, I appreciate your persistence. However, I have to decline your offer of 1,350 Euro per month. The apartment is in high demand, and I believe the value of this apartment is worth more than what you're offering.

As I mentioned earlier, I can offer a discount for a long-term lease, but I can't go lower than 1,400 Euro per month. I believe this is a fair price for this apartment, and it's a good deal for a tenant like you who wants to stay for a long time. What do you think?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
Thank you for your response, Mister Schmidt. I understand your perspective, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm afraid that 1,400 Euro per month is still beyond my budget.

I understand that the apartment is in high demand, and I appreciate the value it has to offer. However, as a student, I have limited financial means, and I'm looking for an apartment that fits my budget.

I'm willing to compromise and offer 1,375 Euro per month. This is the highest I can go, and I hope it's a reasonable offer for you. I'm also willing to provide a guarantee from my parents, as I mentioned earlier.

I hope we can come to an agreement, but if not, I understand and will continue my search for another apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Well, Yi-Nuo Wang, I appreciate your persistence. I can see that you're determined to get a good deal, and I respect that.

Considering your persistence and the fact that you're a responsible tenant, I'm willing to accept your offer of 1,375 Euro per month. I believe this is a fair price for both parties, and I'm looking forward to having you as a tenant. 

I agree to the price of [1,375] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
Great, Mister Schmidt! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. I'm looking forward to moving in and making this apartment my home. Thank you for your understanding and for working with me to find a price that works for both of us.

I'll make sure to provide the guarantee from my parents as soon as possible. And I'll also make sure to pay the rent on time and take good care of the apartment.

Thank you again, and I'm looking forward to a positive and productive relationship as landlord and tenant.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
